medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported crampy right upper quadrant pain that started 4 days ago and radiated to the back and right shoulder. Unlike prior episodes, the pain has not subsided. Symptoms worsened leading to a visit to the emergency department at the advice of the primary care physician.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hyperlipidemia, Trichotillomania, Chronic cervical radiculopathy, Recurrent sinusitis, Insomnia, Erectile dysfunction, Hypertension.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of hepatobiliary disease.
